title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
description: A practical and easy-to-follow course designed for remote tech employees to become proficient in using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams without overwhelming them with too much information at once.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the features and benefits of Microsoft Teams for remote teams.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.description: Step-by-step instructions on how to set up your personal profile in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Basic Navigation
sections.description: Learn how to navigate through different sections of the interface, including channels and chats.

sections.title: Customizing Your Experience
sections.description: Tips on customizing your experience with settings and preferences.

sections.title: Using Chat for Text Communication
sections.description: Best practices for using chat to communicate effectively within teams.

sections.title: Conducting Audio and Video Calls
sections.description: Guidance on setting up and conducting audio and video calls in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Sharing Files
sections.description: How to share files for collaboration within teams using the file sharing feature.

sections.title: Working with Channels
sections.description: Using channels for organizing communication and tasks among team members.
